meanings.sent1: The fountain of youth is said to have unaging properties.
meanings.sent2: She has an unaging beauty that defies time.
meanings.sent3: The painting of the unaging woman seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: His unaging spirit was like a timeless melody that resonated with everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unaging oak tree stood tall and proud, a symbol of everlasting strength.

meanings.definition: Remaining youthful or unchanged with time.
meanings.sent1: The unaging smile on her face brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The unaging love between them was evident in every glance.
meanings.sent3: The unaging clock on the wall always showed the wrong time, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: His unaging enthusiasm for life was like a beacon of light in a dark world.
meanings.sent5: The unaging memories of their childhood adventures brought smiles to their faces.
